item.title: Answering Stackoverflow - Changing the Aspect Ratio of a Video, With Python
item.description: And more importantly, answering my first (and probably last) stack overflow question. I had a bunch of videos (300+) and I needed to change the ratio to 9:16, so I could upload them as youtube shorts. No problem I thought, trusty google will solve my problem. Boom. First result is the exact question I’m asking for. Damn. No answers. We’re going to have to tackle this on our own. We are going to be using python’s library Moviepy to solve our problem.
